data.name: label_header_memberDescription
data.value: Group Name

data.name: label_header_memberJoinLogic
data.value: Logic

data.name: label_header_memberQuantity
data.value: Qty

data.name: label_titlebar_PromotionalOfferEditor
data.value: Promotional Offer Editor
data.comment: Title Bar caption for Promotional Offer Editor

data.name: label_titlebar_PromotionalOfferGrid
data.value: Promotional Offers
data.comment: Title Bar caption for Promotional Offer Grid

data.name: msg_confirm_ClearStores
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all associated stores?

data.name: msg_confirmOfferDelete
data.value: You have selected Promotional Offer: {0} to be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete this offer?
data.comment: Confirm offer delete data pop up msg

data.name: msg_deleteoffer_associateditem
data.value: This Promotional Offer is associated to Price Batch Detail(s). You can NOT delete this Promotional Offer.
data.comment: Cannot delete an offer with related Price Batch detail records

data.name: msg_deleteoffer_associatedstores
data.value: The current offer is associated to the following stores: {0}{1} You cannot delete this offer until the offer has no associated stores.
data.comment: 0 = carriage return, 1= List of stores

data.name: msg_deleteoffer_unbatchedDetails
data.value: You cannot delete an offer that has unbatched price details.

data.name: msg_deleteoffer_unprocessedDetails
data.value: You cannot delete an offer with unprocessed price batch details.

data.name: msg_description_required
data.value: Warning: 'Description' is a required value.
data.comment: Description not present warning

data.name: msg_duplicate_promotionname
data.value: A Promotional Offer already exists with a description of '{0}'. This Description must be unique.
data.comment: Duplicate Promotional Offer Name

data.name: msg_invalid_rewardvalue
data.value: Reward Amount must be greater than 0.
data.comment: Invalid Reward Amount

data.name: msg_invalid_startdate
data.value: Warning: 'Start Date' must be {0} or later.
data.comment: Start date cannot be in the past.

data.name: msg_lossdept_required
data.value: Warning: 'Loss Dept Code' is a required value.

data.name: msg_lossvat_required
data.value: Warning: 'Loss Vat Code' is a required value.

data.name: msg_no_offer_requierments
data.value: You must add at least 1 Requirement Group to a Promotional Offer.
data.comment: No groups added to offer.

data.name: msg_noEditorEnabledPriceMethods
data.value: No existing price methods are enabled for the Promo Offer Editor.

data.name: msg_offerHasUnsentPriceBatchDetails
data.value: The current offer has pending Price Batch Detail records. This screen is Read-only.

data.name: msg_offerIsBeingEdited
data.value: This offer is being edited by {0}. This screen will be read-only.

data.name: msg_offerIsBeingEditedUnlock
data.value: This offer is being edited by {0}. This screen will be read-only unless you choose to force an unlock of the offer. This will potentially cause loss of changes made by you or the other user.Do you wish to unlock the offer?
data.comment: Offer is being edited message + option to unlock

data.name: msg_offerIsPublished
data.value: The current offer has already been published. This screen is Read-only.
data.comment: No changes can be made to a published offer.

data.name: msg_offerPublished
data.value: This Promotional Offer has already been published. No changes can be made.
data.comment: Promotional Offer cannot be edited because PriceBatchDetail records exist.

data.name: msg_pricingmethod_required
data.value: Warning: 'Pricing Method' is a required value.
data.comment: Pricing method is required

data.name: msg_referencecode_required
data.value: Warning: 'Reference Code' is a required value.
data.comment: Reference code is required

data.name: msg_rewardtype_required
data.value: Warning: 'Reward Type' is a required value.
data.comment: Reward Type is required

data.name: msg_StartEndDate_invalid
data.value: Warning: 'End Date' needs to be after the 'Start Date'
data.comment: Start Date later than End Date warning

data.name: msg_storesInvalidForPricingMethod
data.value: Warning: The following stores are associated with this offer but do not support the new Pricing Method: {0}. Please unasscociate these stores or change the Pricing Method.
data.comment: Stores do not support Pricing Method

data.name: msg_toofewGroups
data.value: You have not specified enough groups. {0} groups are required for a valid offer when Price Method {1} is selected.
data.comment: Too few groups for price method.

data.name: msg_unlockOffer
data.value: Really unlock this offer?

data.name: msg_unspecifiedError
data.value: An unspecified error has occured.
data.comment: Run-time error
